Package dev

Interface Summary
DeviceUpdater.Listener The Listener interface allows dispatching event to listener object when a new device is detected as online.
 

Class Summary
BackupdataResource The resource represents a backup data.
BackupThread The BackupThread periodically gathers all the File items for which number of Backup/Location is less than Backup/@count and tries to backup that file to one more online device.
Device An object to represent a device information.
DeviceMulticastUpdater Extended DeviceUpdater to support multicast device discovery.
DevicesResource The DevicesResource is used by the NameServer to represent the list of online devices.
DeviceUpdater The updater thread which periodically refreshes the online devices list by pinging the nameserver.
MetadataResource The metadata resource represents the metadata on a particular device which is put by another machine to synchronize the metadata.
MetadataUpdater The event handler which updates the metadata with the remote machine whenever the updater or devices signals a change event.
NameClient The client to get or post a devices resource.
